title: Help! Can anybody tell me what font this is?
content:
Hi, Is this a typeface or hand rendered?! I keep seeing similar styles used, but not sure if they exist as paid for typefaces.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [ClubKuru.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20130516022246/http:/typophile.com/files/ClubKuru_0.png) | 779.95 KB |

comments.content:
Seconded. 3 different /U.  
Alternatives: [Thick Hand Drawn](http://web.archive.org/web/20130516022246/http:/www.pixelpixelpixel.com/2012/02/thick-hand-drawn-font-ai), [Meat](http://web.archive.org/web/20130516022246/http:/www.youworkforthem.com/font/T4155/meat), [OffHand Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20130516022246/http:/www.youworkforthem.com/product.php?sku=T0201), [Plakkaat](http://web.archive.org/web/20130516022246/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/hanoded/plakkaat), [Fresh Paint](http://web.archive.org/web/20130516022246/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/highground/fresh-paint), [From Where You Are](http://web.archive.org/web/20130516022246/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/kimberly-geswein/from-where-you-are), [Scraper](http://web.archive.org/web/20130516022246/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/highground/scraper), [Brushed](http://web.archive.org/web/20130516022246/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/design/brushed), [Seven](http://web.archive.org/web/20130516022246/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/seven), [1968 GLC Graffiti](http://web.archive.org/web/20130516022246/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/glc/1968-glc-graffiti), [Pastel](http://web.archive.org/web/20130516022246/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/font-fabric/pastel), [Face Your Fears](http://web.archive.org/web/20130516022246/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/hanoded/face-your-fears), [Trollslayer](http://web.archive.org/web/20130516022246/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/hanoded/trollslayer), [Nightbird](http://web.archive.org/web/20130516022246/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/hanoded/nightbird)

Thanks David, I guessed it was.

Ryuk some of those examples you found are great, especially 'Fresh Paint' and 'Scraper'. Thanks very much for your help!

Jason.
